data.value: Falls back to traditional mod.jar placement, losing Polymerium's file management benefits.

data.name: AssetImporterDialog_AsAssetPrompt
data.value: Persistent files stay in the persist directory across deployments; portable files are persistent files stored in the import directory that get bundled when exporting modpacks.

data.value: Are you sure you want to clear all statistics for this instance? This action cannot be undone.

data.value: Are you sure you want to clear all action records for this instance? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: SettingsView_ClearStatisticsConfirmationMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to clear all play statistics for all instances? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: SettingsView_ClearRecordsConfirmationMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to clear all action records for all instances? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: OobeWelcome_Description
data.value: Experience a new way of managing your Minecraft instances with portable metadata and intelligent resource management.

data.name: OobeFeatures_Subtitle
data.value: Explore the key features that set us apart

data.name: OobeFeatures_GitIntegration_Description
data.value: Use Git to collaborate on modpack development with portable metadata files

data.name: OobeFeatures_PortableMetadata_Description
data.value: Share your exact game experience with a simple configuration file

data.name: OobeFeatures_MultiRepository_Description
data.value: Native integration with CurseForge and Modrinth

data.name: OobeFeatures_SmartResource_Description
data.value: Zero file duplication with intelligent symlink distribution

data.name: OobeFeatures_IntegrityCheck_Description
data.value: Every deployment validates file completeness and correctness

data.name: OobeFeatures_OneClick_Description
data.value: Build your game files on-demand from lightweight metadata

data.name: OobeFinish_Description
data.value: Start creating your first Minecraft instance and enjoy a new way of game management.

data.name: OobeFinish_Tip
data.value: Tip: You can always change these settings later in the Settings page.

data.name: OobePrivilege_Subtitle
data.value: Enable Developer Mode for optimal performance

data.name: OobePrivilege_InstructionsDescription
data.value: 1. Click the button below to open Windows Settings 2. Find "Developer Mode" toggle 3. Turn it ON 4. Return here and click "Recheck"

data.name: OobePrivilege_SafetyDescription
data.value: Developer Mode is a Windows feature that enables symbolic links creation without admin rights. It's safe for normal use and can be disabled anytime.

data.name: OobePrivilege_StatusGrantedMessage
data.value: Symbolic link creation is enabled. You're all set!

data.name: OobePrivilege_StatusRequiredMessage
data.value: Developer Mode is needed to create symbolic links for smart resource management.

data.name: OobePrivilege_GrantedWhatDescription
data.value: Symbolic Link Creation privilege from Windows Developer Mode. This allows Polymerium to create file links instead of copying files, enabling efficient resource management across multiple game instances.

data.name: OobePrivacy_WhatWeCollectDescription
data.value: When the application crashes or encounters errors, we may collect error information and diagnostic data to help improve the user experience in future updates.

data.name: OobePrivacy_Promise1Description
data.value: We never collect your personal information, account credentials, or game content.

data.name: OobePrivacy_Promise2Description
data.value: All your game data stays on your computer. Nothing is uploaded without explicit action.

data.name: OobePrivacy_Promise3Description
data.value: This is an open-source project. You can review all our code on GitHub.

data.name: OobePrivacy_AgreementNote
data.value: By continuing, you acknowledge and agree to the privacy terms above.

data.name: MarketplaceSearchView_Message
data.value: View and download modpacks from various sources. If you need more precise search filters, please search for the modpack on the corresponding website and then enter the name here to install.

data.name: LandingView_Subtitle
data.value: Quick access to your game world
